sentence.Network_en: Nothing swaggered with a raucous noise to disarrange the perfect harmony.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有任何东西以粗哑刺耳的噪音扰乱这完美的和谐.

sentence.Network_en: Have I the right to disarrange what it has arranged?
sentence.Network_cn: 我有什么权利扰乱上天的安排 呢 ?
